ai-mil7.5.10:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what five factors should be cared by one who says?”
ai-mil7.5.10:1.3_0: In the same way, all of them are seen that he has got tired from the bodies of body, all of them are defilements that should be given in the same way.
ai-mil7.5.10:1.4_0: This is the first simile of elephants.
ai-mil7.5.10:2.1_0: Furthermore, an elephant ... in all directions the world looks ahead with his hand.
ai-mil7.5.10:2.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who practices all around you should not look forward to the world. You shouldn’t be swallowed by the intermediate directions.
ai-mil7.5.10:2.3_0: This is the second thing, great king.
ai-mil7.5.10:3.1_0: Furthermore, the elephant does not get close to Godhā the level of the elephants, cavalry, and does not go there. Wherever she teaches the Dhamma.
ai-mil7.5.10:3.2_0: In the same way, great king, anyone who lives for alms is caught up in the shade of the holes. When you see caste, you should be constantly seemed to the root of a tree, or to be caught in the same hymns, or caught up in a neighbourhood.
ai-mil7.5.10:3.3_0: This is the third way of elephants.
ai-mil7.5.10:4.1_0: Furthermore, an elephant trunks out of the water lilies, and cattle across the waters of the elephants, horses with blossoms, lotuses, and creepers.
ai-mil7.5.10:4.2_0: In the same way, anyone who lives in balance amongst those who are skilled, practitioners, braying the marks, collecting the lotus ponds, hunger, thirsty, and delivered with knowledge and freedom.
ai-mil7.5.10:5.1_0: Furthermore, an elephant puts his foot downward, puts it away, and lifts it down.
ai-mil7.5.10:5.2_0: In the same way, one who lives with his own hands, puts his foot down in order, pull, lifts his foot downwards, pulls his feet, with mindfulness and situational awareness.
ai-mil7.5.10:5.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.5.10:8.1_0: The fourth sub-chapter on upper robes is finished.
ai-mil7.5.10:10.4_0: like a wound, the elephant with its taming,
